title: Probably a custom font
content:
Hi

This is probably a custom made font but could anyone point me in a direction towards something similar?  
I love the simplicity of the script font.

Just to be clear, it is the font of the word audio i'm looking for.

/J

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114908im_/http:/typophile.com/files/b081c8e4deb445a0c00b5cea4978a3c8_6364.jpg)
author: fridsen

comments.content: The |A| looks custom as you say, but you may like **[HT Gelateria](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114908/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Flat-it%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=HT%20Gelateria%20-%20Regular&fid=51eee6970bbeef4b67686d54a5cf9a7f&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=Audio&wrap=2)** or **[HT Osteria](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114908/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Flat-it%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=HT%20Osteria%20-%20Regular&fid=f7b095d0ec1159662c9807be4b9ded68&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=Audio&wrap=2)** or even **[HT Neon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114908/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Flat-it%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=HT%20Neon%20-%20Regular&fid=e46bcca671f4f45edeae5ae793160ef5&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=Audio&wrap=2)** all by Ryoichi Tsunekawa [Flat-it, 2008]
I'm probably wrong but I'd give a try with [Tropica Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114908/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/tropica).

Another that could work is Thirsty Soft [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/yellow-design/thirsty-soft/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114908/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/yellow-design/thirsty-soft/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/yellow-design/thirsty-soft/")  
Also KG The Fighter [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/kimberly-geswein/kg-the-fighter/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114908/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/kimberly-geswein/kg-the-fighter/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/kimberly-geswein/kg-the-fighter/")  
Don
